CustomField.description: The unit of time the Project Task's length must fit into. For example if the unit is 4 a task must be 4, 8 12 hours etc. The same rule applies to Time Entry objects. The value of this field is copied from the value of the Project when the task is created (by the ProjectTaskConfiguration trigger) and once set is read only. This is a system field and should never be visible.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a system field and should never be visible.
CustomField.label: Hours Block
